name: Noonna the Rock
storyline:
In 2028 Korea, near future
The main character, 'chun-yup', was a young man who worked hard to become a singer-songwriter.
However, he failed the audition and fell into great frustration.
The next day, the president of the record company appears to scout 'chun-yup' who was wandering around.
With this opportunity, 'chun-yup' enters a death metal band and becomes active, where he meets attractive female characters.
What kind of love story awaits 'chun-yup'?
Check out the new sense of visual novel 'Noonna the Rock'
summary: 'Noonna the Rock' is a special visual novel game that deals with the special material of death metal and the romance between the heroine 'Noonna' and the Protagonist.
